Package userinterface

Class LeafPane

java.lang.Object
userinterface.AbstractFrame
userinterface.Pane
userinterface.LeafPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
DocumentListener
public class LeafPane
extends Pane
A class to represent the portion of Browsr that renders the document extending from Pane (as defined in the assignment)

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • LeafPane

      public LeafPane​(ContentFrame contentFrame, Pane parentPane) throws IllegalDimensionException
      Construct a ContentFrame with the given parameters. The coordinates and dimensions are copied from the given ContentFrame.
      Parameters:
      contentFrame - : The contents of this LeafPane in a ContentFrame object.
      parentPane - : The parent Pane of this LeafPane.
      Throws:
      IllegalDimensionException - : When one of the dimensions is negative.

      public void handleMouse​(int id, int x, int y, int clickCount, int button, int modifiersEx)
      Handle mouseEvents. Determine if this LeafPane was pressed and do the right actions.
      Specified by:
      handleMouse in class Pane
      Parameters:
      id - : The type of mouse activity
      x - : The x coordinate of the mouse activity
      y - : The y coordinate of the mouse activity
      clickCount - : The number of clicks
      button - : The mouse button that was clicked
      modifiersEx - : The control keys that were held on the click

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      keyCode - : The KeyEvent code (Determines the involved key)
      keyChar - : The character representation of the involved key
      modifiersEx - : Specifies other keys that were involved in the event

      public Pane getFirstChild()
